Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Boston in 1969...
Injured on 6/28/1969 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 7/23/1969 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 5/11/1972, off Bill Stafford (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1972, off Fred Klages (CHW)...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/28/1979 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 7/16/1979 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1980 to a minor league deal...
